ComicInfo.Title: The Search
ComicInfo.Summary:
Want to see Winnie the Pooh fight demons with a chainsaw?
Join the adventures of Christopher Saint Robin and his best friend Pooh Bear as they search for their missing friend, Piglet. After the shy and timid little hunter disappeared on a mission in the 100-acre woods. Can they protect the 100-acre woods from demons, and the other waring nations? And what happens when Wonderland, the wonderful Oz and many more are all-in one-story land? Check out this action-adventure story for a fun ride!
This story looks to honor and respect the legacy of these characters that many of us for generations have grown up loving and caring for. With a story that uses A. A. Milne originals as a backdrop for what unfolds in this version.
